title: Daisy Disk 3.0 [Dmg - Eng][TNT Village]
description:
Daisy Disk 3.0

Description
DaisyDisk helps you recover disk space by finding and removing large useless files.
Browse your disks using a visual interactive map and remove unnecessary files with a simple drag and drop. Recover wasted disk space when you need it most.
Now with full Retina display support.
Featured in the Best of Mac App Store 2011
Editors' Choice, 5 stars by Macworld UK
